00040 enum _plugin_mode{
00041         GFAL_PLUGIN_ALL=0,
00042         GFAL_PLUGIN_ACCESS,
00043         GFAL_PLUGIN_CHMOD,
00044         GFAL_PLUGIN_RENAME,
00045         GFAL_PLUGIN_SYMLINK,
00046         GFAL_PLUGIN_STAT,
00047         GFAL_PLUGIN_LSTAT,
00048         GFAL_PLUGIN_MKDIR,
00049         GFAL_PLUGIN_RMDIR,
00050         GFAL_PLUGIN_OPENDIR, // concat of opendir readdir, closedir
00051         GFAL_PLUGIN_OPEN, // concat of open read, close
00052         GFAL_PLUGIN_RESOLVE_GUID,
00053         GFAL_PLUGIN_GETXATTR,
00054         GFAL_PLUGIN_SETXATTR,
00055         GFAL_PLUGIN_LISTXATTR,
00056         GFAL_PLUGIN_READLINK,
00057         GFAL_PLUGIN_UNLINK
00058         
00059 };

00070 struct _gfal_plugin_interface{
00071         // handle
00072         plugin_handle handle;
00073         // to have name/id of the plugin MUST be IMPLEMENTED
00074         const char* (*getName)();
00078         void (*plugin_delete)(plugin_handle); 
00084         gboolean (*check_plugin_url)(plugin_handle, const char* url,  plugin_mode mode, GError** err);
00088         int (*accessG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, int mode, GError** err);
00092         int     (*chmodG)(plugin_handle, const char *, mode_t, GError** err);
00093         int     (*renameG)(plugin_handle, const char *, const char *, GError** err);
00094         int (*symlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, GError** err);
00095         int (*statG)(plugin_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00096         int (*lstatG)(plugin_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00097         ssize_t (*readlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char*, char* buff, size_t buffsiz, GError** );
00098 
00099         // directory management
00100          gfal_file_handle (*opendirG)(plugin_handle, const char*, GError**); 
00101          int (*closedirG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00102          struct dirent* (*readdirG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00103         int (*mkdirpG)(plugin_handle, const char*, mode_t, gboolean pflag, GError**);  //function pointer for the mkdir call, if pflag is set, the call is considered like a recursive call for a full path creation
00104         int (*rmdirG )(plugin_handle, const char*, GError**);            
00105 
00106          // basic file operation, 
00107          gfal_file_handle (*openG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, int flag, mode_t mode, GError**);
00108          int (*readG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00109          int (*writeG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00110          int (*closeG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, GError **);
00111          int (*lseekG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, off_t offset, int whence, GError** err);
00112          
00113          // vector operations
00119          ssize_t (*preadG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, off_t offset, GError**);        
00120          ssize_t (*pwriteG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, const void* buff, size_t count, off_t offset, GError**);
00121          
00122                  
00123          // remove operations
00127          int (*unlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, GError**);
00128          
00129          // advanced attributes management
00133          ssize_t (*getxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, void* buff, size_t s_buff, GError** err);
00137          ssize_t (*listxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, char* list, size_t s_list, GError** err);
00141          int (*setxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, const void*, size_t , int, GError** );
00142 
00143 
00150          int (*is_used_parameter)(plugin_handle, const char* namespace, const char* key);
00151 
00159          void (*notify_change_parameter)(plugin_handle, const char* namespace, const char* key);
00160 };
00161 
00165 struct _plugin_opts{
00166         gfal_plugin_interface plugin_list[MAX_PLUGIN_LIST];
00167         int plugin_number;
00168 };
